Comments.summary: Sets the value for a single label on a dataset. The label will be added if it does not exist, or updated if it already exists.

remarks.para: The dataset is first fetched to retrieve the current values, then a patch call is made.

Comments.returns: The previous value of the label, or null if the label was not previously set.

Parameter.Name: labelName

Comments.summary: Removes a label from a dataset, if it previously existed. It is not an error to attempt to remove a label that doesn't already exist.
Comments.returns: The previous value of the label, or null if the label was not previously set.
A dictionary with the labels on the dataset before they were cleared.

Parameter.Name: labels
Parameter.Comment: The labels to set. Must contain at least one entry; keys must not be null, but values may be (indicating label removal).

Comments.summary: Sets or removes one or more labels on {target}.
Comments.remarks: Each entry in is treated as a label to set or remove. If the value is null, it will be removed from the dataset; otherwise, it will be set/added. Labels which do not have an entry in the dictionary will be ignored.
Comments.returns: A dictionary with the same keys as , and values indicating the corresponding label value before this operation completed. Labels which weren't present on the dataset before the modification have corresponding null values in the returned dictionary.
